nature was everywhere | here is a praying mantis i found on my hike .

output.sentences: Hiking on the trail, we found an obstacle.
When we stopped we looked at nature and saw a praying mantis.
We reflected on how beautiful the simple things in the world are.
On the wild greenery, there was a pop of red.
When we headed home, the view of the trail was stunning.
